metadata.title: Alaska Basemap CD, version 2.0
metadata.description: The Alaska Basemap CD is a compilation of more than 150 maps and tables all about Alaska. Version 2.0 of the CD also contains ESRI's free ArcExplorer software so that the 650 megabytes of Alaskan information can be accessed on Windows 95/NT platforms without the need to purchase any specialized geographic information systems (GIS) software. These pages contain specific metadata about each of the maps, drawings, and tables on the CD.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To provide information about Alaska.

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: Unknown

Access constraints: Must purchase the CD

Use constraints: Refer to vendor policy.

Distribution liability: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system.
